title: Fragment, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, gold metallic thread
Technique: couching stitches on supplementary warp pile (velvet)
description: Irregular-shaped fragment probably from a sleeve of a court robe. Red velvet with a design of ovals, spirals and S-shapes in couched gold.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 19th century.Medium: silk, gold metallic thread
Technique: couching stitches on supplementary warp pile (velvet). 1936-34-3.
